problem.markdown:
>>1. Eddy currents can be used to find out<< ( ) Cracks in material ( ) Thickness of nonconductive coating (x) Both Cracks in material and Thickness of nonconductive coating
>>2) The heat generated in the transformer is dissipated to the surroundings mainly by<< ( ) conduction ( ) radiation (x) convection
>>3) Basic source of magnetism is<< (x) movement of charged particles ( ) charged particles alone ( ) magnetic dipoles
>>4) The magnetic field of a magnet<< ( ) only exists on the poles themselves (x) weakens as the distance from the magnet increases ( ) is always as strong anywhere around a magnet
>>5) LVDT means<< ( ) Linear Variable Differential Transistor (x) Linear Variable Differential Transformer ( ) Linear Variable Displacement Transducer
problem.p: 1. Eddy currents can be used to find out

choicegroup.label: 1. Eddy currents can be used to find out
choicegroup.choice: Both Cracks in material and Thickness of nonconductive coating

choicegroup.label: 2) The heat generated in the transformer is dissipated to the surroundings mainly by

problem.p: 4) The magnetic field of a magnet

choicegroup.label: 4) The magnetic field of a magnet

weakens as the distance from the magnet increases
is always as strong anywhere around a magnet
